nodes.text: Echani Ritual Brands were double-bladed swords used in ritual combat by the Echani Firedancers circa 4000 BBY. When used, the Firedancers would manipulate the weapons in complex weaving patterns that were so graceful they were more similar to dance than to combat.
Around 3956 BBY, one was for sale by Kebla Yurt at her store, the Equipment Emporium, on the planet Taris.

The Echani Ritual Brand appeared in the 2003 roleplaying game, Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic. Unlike many items, it did not appear in its 2004 sequel, Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords.
The items in-game description reads: Echani Firedancers use the double bladed Ritual Brand in a dodging and slicing pattern so graceful it looks more like a dance than combat.
